title: Tech corruption
story: In the heart of Silicon Valley, a powerful tech company's facade of innovation flows a dark underbelly of corruption and deceit.
Employees have started disappearing mysteriously, their families left with no answers and the company offering no explanation.
Our investigation will uncover the truth behind the corporation's malevolent dealings and bring justice to those affected.
prompt: An image of a dark and luxurious office building with a hidden layer of corruption

suspect.name: Martin Warner
suspect.alibi: Claims to have been in a business meeting at the time of the disappearances.
suspect.confirmation: Security footage places him at the office during the times of the incidents.

witness.name: Elena Rodriguez
witness.observation: Notices strange activity in the company's server room at odd hours.
witness.description: Determined and fearless in her pursuit of the truth

npcs.name: Isabelle Thompson
npcs.dialogue: I heard footsteps in the hallway late at night, but when I checked, no one was there.

npcs.name: Jake Peterson
npcs.dialogue: I saw Martin Warner entering the restricted area last Friday night.

clues.Front entrance: Security footage of Martin Warner entering the building at unusual hours.
clues.Server room: A mysterious and unauthorized USB drive found connected to the main server.
clues.Employee's desk: Notes referencing shady backdoor deals with government officials.
clues.CEO's office: A hidden stash of cash and incriminating documents locked in the CEO's safe.
